title: Please change Zoe's E + Cleanse double damage interaction or description
body: Zoe's Sleepy Trouble Bubble's description says, "The first source of damage that breaks the sleep is doubled." Naturally, one would think that if you cleanse the sleep, the next source of damage wouldn't be doubled, but it is. It occurs if you cleanse the slow into sleep, or just the sleep itself. Either change the interaction to do what it says, or change the description to say that an enemy hit takes double damage please.

That's the thing, I'm not sure if it's a bug, an oversight, or working as intended. The description says one thing, but they may have just coded it stupidly, like how Skarner's E says that he gets his passive movement speed and attack speed for the entire stun duration, but he loses it while Scuttler is still stunned because of how Scuttler gets cced for longer

100% intended, even after the sleep expires normally (after the 2s duration), there's a leniency time of about 0.5 sec where the true damage can still be procced.

It's a CertainlyT champ, so he crams as much training wheel stuff as he can when he makes champions.

It works exactly the way it should, and in most cases it will work exactly like described too. Cleanse doesn't remove debuffs, it only removes CC (except suppression and airborne) plus some summoner spell effects. And since the double damage debuff is a debuff it's not removed by Cleanse.
So the issue here is simply that they failed to account for Cleanse when writing the description. They should just rephrase Zoe's description to "The first source of damage within 2,5 seconds is doubled". That way it accounts for Cleanse and other potential CC removers as well.
